concept-wr.title: Supported Networks and Interface Configurations
concept-wr.shortdesc: The same logical networks are supported in all configurations. Actual network requirements and recommendations vary depending on the configuration.

conbody.p: Logical interfaces can be dedicated to single or link aggregated interfaces for maximum performance and isolation or combined in various combinations with other logical interfaces onto a common physical interface or a link aggregated interface and separated into isolated L2 LAN segments in the top-of-rack switch.
